mosinstall.name: Wrapper
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Creates an IFrame that will wrap an external page/site into Joomla

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page. If left blank, the Menu name will be used instead

param.name: scrolling
param.label: Scroll Bars
param.description: Show/Hide Horizontal and Vertical scroll bars.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the IFrame Window, you can enter an absolute figure in pixels, or a relative figure by adding a %

param.name: height_auto
param.label: Auto Height
param.description: The height will automatically be set to the size of the external page. This will only work for pages on your own domain. If you see a javascript error, make sure this param is disabled. This will break XHTML compatability for this page.

param.name: add
param.label: Auto Add
param.description: By default http:// will be added unless it detects http:// or https:// in the url link you provide, this allow you to switch this ability off
